page.title: 06RIVER SOAR IN BARROW
page.content:
The{River Soar}runs through Barrow and eventually through Mountsorrel and Leicester. Beside the river is a pub called the{Riverside.}The river is an attraction for families in summer. People come on boats to Barrow on the river. When the river floods the{Slabs are not affected because the{Slabs}are raised above the ground so that when the flood comes you can walk along the path to Quorn without getting wet. The fields next to the river are very popular in summer for getting a tan. Over the river is a bridge where you can see the{key stone.}Next to the river is an old{Boat House.}On the river are many{motor cruisers.}The River Soar detours from the{Grand {Union Canal. The River Soar}is very popular with fishermen at weekends.
{RICHARD ANDREWS
